qa.name: Elias
qa.appearance: Translucent with a faint blue glow

json_to_edit.voice_over: In death, I sought meaning more than I ever did in life.
json_to_edit.description: Elias, a lonely ghost, encounters Sophia, a medium who can see and communicate with him.
json_to_edit.name: Spectral Encounter
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A lonely ghost named Elias meets Sophia, a medium who helps him find his purpose.

qa.action: The abandoned mansion looms in the misty night, its windows dark and empty.

hf.action: Elias floats through the dusty hallway, his translucent form barely visible.

tr.action: Elias's face shows a mix of loneliness and curiosity as he senses a presence.

xc.action: Sophia enters the mansion, her shawl billowing slightly as she steps inside.

ka.action: Sophia walks cautiously through the foyer, her eyes scanning the room.

fn.action: Sophia's eyes widen as she sees Elias's ghostly form for the first time.

af.action: Elias and Sophia face each other, a mix of surprise and understanding passing between them.

qo.action: Sophia speaks softly to Elias, her words seeming to give him hope.

edit_command: Rearrange the order of shots to: 4, 1, 5, 2, 6, 3, 7, 8. Don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we need to rearrange the order of shots as requested by the director. this involves updating the "list_display_order" field in the "shots" object. the new order will be: xc (4th shot), qa (1st shot), ka (5th shot), hf (2nd shot), fn (6th shot), tr (3rd shot), af (7th shot), qo (8th shot). we'll keep all other information intact, including the content of each shot and all other scene details.
